## Line Map -- Endowment Asset Allocations
```{r libraries}
library(ggplot2)
library(hrbrthemes)
library(xlsx)
library(dplyr)

```
Loading the Data
```{r data, echo = FALSE}
revenue <- read.xlsx("endowment-1.xlsx", 
                    sheetName = "revenue",
                    rowIndex = 1:15,
                    colIndex = 1:6)

revenueMelted <- reshape2::melt(revenue, id.var='Financial.Year')
head(breakdownMelted)
```

```{r plotting}
ggplot(revenueMelted, aes(x= Financial.Year, y = value, col = variable)) + geom_line()

```
